title: Development and Implementation Process of Inquiry-Based English Learning Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary and grammar comprehension, along with foundational workplace English communication skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning linked to workplace environments for office/administrative professionals, emphasizing self-directed learning with digital tools

learning_goals: Learners enhance academic English reading/writing skills while exploring work-related topics

Learners can apply five core English communication strategies required in real work scenarios (e.g., email writing, video conference facilitation, conflict resolution expressions) with ≥80% accuracy through project-based activities (team task simulations, global collaboration scenarios, etc.).

Learners can use digital tools like Google Forms and Microsoft Forms to complete a monthly self-assessment survey (5 questions) over six months, collect ≥3 structured feedbacks from peers/supervisors, and visualize results on a learning achievement dashboard (charts/graphs).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
